publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7673 Alasdair Allan: Coastguard Rescue Teams—That the Parliament praises the work of coastguard rescue teams in Stornoway and Ness, Isle of Lewis, who were called out recently to help care workers reach frail and older people in their homes in poor driving conditions due to snow and welcomes their vital contribution toward ensuring that these essential services were maintained. Supported by: Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Patricia Ferguson*, Bill Kidd*, Rob Gibson*, Kenneth Gibson*, Robin Harper*, Bob Doris*, Brian Adam*
S3M-7673 Coastguard Rescue Teams (lodged on 10 January 2011) Stewart Maxwell*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-7673 Coastguard Rescue Teams (lodged on 10 January 2011) Jamie Stone*, Jamie Hepburn*, John Farquhar Munro*
S3M-7673 Coastguard Rescue Teams (lodged on 10 January 2011) Stuart McMillan*

S3M-7673 Alasdair Allan: Coastguard Rescue Teams—That the Parliament praises the work of coastguard rescue teams in Stornoway and Ness, Isle of Lewis, who were called out recently to help care workers reach frail and older people in their homes in poor driving conditions due to snow and welcomes their vital contribution toward ensuring that these essential services were maintained. Supported by: Shirley-Anne Somerville, Patricia Ferguson, Bill Kidd, Rob Gibson, Kenneth Gibson, Robin Harper, Bob Doris, Brian Adam, Stewart Maxwell, Gil Paterson, Jamie Stone, Jamie Hepburn, John Farquhar Munro, Stuart McMillan, Joe FitzPatrick*
S3M-7673 Coastguard Rescue Teams (lodged on 10 January 2011) Rhoda Grant*
